name: Vinsmoke Niji
text:
On Play: If you have equal to or less DON!! on your field than your opponent, choose one of the following.
• K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters that cost 2 or less.
• Return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters that cost 4 or less to their owner's hand.

effect.text:
